title: Microsoft Surface Neo (Dual-Screen Tablet) Breakdown - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Microsoft Surface Neo (Dual-Screen Tablet) Breakdown - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description: Microsoft announced the new Surface Neo, but you can't have it until 2020! Also, there's a new Surface Pro X, Pro 7, and Surface Earbuds?? This, and more, will be covered in Krazy Ken's new segment: KRAZY KEN'S TECH BREAKDOWN! Join him, or he might breakdown, himself.  Support the show and get in the credits   Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for more tech videos!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures - Microsoft Surface Neo (Dual-Screen Tablet) Breakdown  Pledge on Patreon now to get your name in the show credits and gain access to Krazy Ken's VIP Discord channel!*   Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?    Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  *not all Patreon tiers qualify for all rewards  #KrazyKen #ComputerClan #MicrosoftEvent
